fabrics.name: Merino Wool
fabrics.description: Fine, soft wool from Merino sheep, known for exceptional comfort and versatility
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean recommended. Can hand wash in cool water with wool-specific detergent. Lay flat to dry. Steam iron on wool setting.
fabrics.common_uses: Dress shirts, lightweight suits, base layers, year-round suiting

fabrics.name: Worsted Wool
fabrics.description: Tightly spun wool with smooth finish, the standard for professional business attire
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean only for structured garments. Steam between wearings. Brush regularly to maintain appearance.
fabrics.common_uses: Business suits, formal trousers, blazers, professional wear

fabrics.name: Tweed
fabrics.description: Thick, textured wool fabric with rustic charm, traditionally from Scotland
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean. Air out regularly. Brush with stiff brush to remove dirt. Store with moth prevention.
fabrics.common_uses: Casual jackets, country wear, caps, bags, winter outerwear

fabrics.name: Cashmere
fabrics.description: Luxuriously soft fiber from cashmere goat undercoat, premium and expensive
fabrics.care_instructions: Hand wash in cool water with cashmere shampoo or dry clean. Never wring. Lay flat to dry. Store folded, never hanging.
fabrics.common_uses: Luxury coats, sweaters, scarves, high-end suiting

fabrics.name: Cotton Poplin
fabrics.description: Crisp, plain-weave cotton with subtle crosswise rib, ideal for shirts
fabrics.care_instructions: Machine washable. Iron while slightly damp for best results. Can be starched for extra crispness.
fabrics.common_uses: Dress shirts, blouses, summer dresses, lightweight trousers

fabrics.name: Linen
fabrics.description: Natural fiber from flax plant, prized for coolness and natural texture
fabrics.care_instructions: Machine wash in cool water. Line dry or tumble low. Iron while damp for crisp finish. Embrace natural wrinkles for casual look.
fabrics.common_uses: Summer suits, casual shirts, dresses, home textiles

fabrics.name: Silk Charmeuse
fabrics.description: Luxurious silk with satin weave, glossy front and matte back
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean recommended. Can hand wash in cool water with silk detergent. Never wring. Roll in towel to remove water, then lay flat. Iron on silk setting while slightly damp.
fabrics.common_uses: Evening wear, blouses, linings, lingerie, luxury garments

fabrics.name: Denim
fabrics.description: Sturdy cotton twill with diagonal ribbing, typically indigo-dyed
fabrics.care_instructions: Machine wash inside out in cool water. Tumble dry low or line dry. Can fade with washing (often desired). Iron if needed.
fabrics.common_uses: Jeans, jackets, skirts, casual wear, bags

fabrics.name: Polyester Suiting
fabrics.description: Synthetic fabric often blended with wool for durability and easy care
fabrics.care_instructions: Machine washable or dry clean. Wrinkle-resistant. Iron on low setting. Avoid high heat.
fabrics.common_uses: Business wear, uniforms, travel suits, affordable suiting

fabrics.name: Canvas
fabrics.description: Heavy-duty plain-weave fabric, extremely durable and sturdy
fabrics.care_instructions: Machine wash in warm water. Can withstand heavy use. Iron on high heat. Pre-wash to prevent shrinkage.
fabrics.common_uses: Bags, upholstery, outerwear, workwear, structured garments

fabrics.name: Viscose/Rayon
fabrics.description: Semi-synthetic fiber made from wood pulp, affordable silk alternative
fabrics.care_instructions: Dry clean or hand wash in cold water. Can shrink. Lay flat to dry. Iron on low setting while damp.
fabrics.common_uses: Dresses, blouses, linings, affordable draping garments

fabrics.name: Jersey Knit
fabrics.description: Stretchy knit fabric, comfortable and body-skimming
fabrics.care_instructions: Machine wash gentle cycle. Do not wring. Lay flat or hang to dry. Low heat iron or steam.
fabrics.common_uses: T-shirts, dresses, casual wear, athletic wear, comfortable garments
